channel.title: QubesWhonix 13 or 14
channel.description: What is better to use. Qubes Whonix 13 is stable, but is using old Qubes and when I was reading wiki, it says that Qubes 3.2 have security issues. Qubes-Whonix 14 is testing and could have bugs. I dont know what version is better to use? Give a advice please

item.title: QubesWhonix 13 or 14
item.dc:creator: veraQuin
item.description:
i think it comes down to personal preference.

i prefer to stay current and ahead like a pirate in unknown waters

rather than stable and out of date.

not that 13 is out of date. it is still being updated.

Read full topic

item.title: QubesWhonix 13 or 14
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
There is also Qubes-Whonix 13 for Qubes 4.

Read full topic
